Item.Caption: Monument to the founders of Kyiv
CURRENCY - silver ingot that served as money in Kiev in XII-XIII centuries.
Column of Magdeburg Rights (monument of the Baptism of Rus)
House of Kyiv-Mohyla Collegium. Engraving XVII.
Coat of arms of Peter Graves
The emblem of the Kyiv region in 1672
Seal of Kyiv city council. In 1698
Coins of King Sigismund III, who went to Kiev in the middle of the XVII century.
Coins of the Empress Catherine II, who went to Kiev at the end of XVIII century.
